result.html: Bhris tú an dlíYou broke the law.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris tú an dlíYou broke the law.

result.html: Sháraigh an trádalaí an dlíThe trader broke the law.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ an trádalaí an dlíThe trader broke the law.

result.html: Sháraigh sé an churiarracht dhomhandaHe broke the world record.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé an ċuriarraċt ḋoṁandaHe broke the world record.

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.orig: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora

result.ponchtml: Ḃris meangaḋ gáire amaċ ar aġaiḋ an ḟáilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
